pages.title: Growing Up
pages.text: A turn ability that increases Saps power by 1.

pages.title: Stone Toss
pages.text: A play ability that causes a direct attack for 1 damage. This does not cause the opponent to fight back, but will cause any fight triggers on Rok (there shouldn't be) and damaged triggers. It is a direct attack so damaged triggers will know Rok dealt the damage.

pages.title: Tasty Bacon
pages.text: A death ability that causes Oinke's player to gain 2 life.

pages.title: Stoke Flames
pages.text: A death ability that causes all of your buddies in the fire grouping to gain 1 power. Will only trigger if you have at least one fire buddy for Cole to upgrade.

pages.title: Iron Temper
pages.text: A kill ability that causes Metalico to gain 1 power when it kills another buddy. This will trigger before any death triggers, and can save Metalico from death.

pages.title: Simple Enchant
pages.text: A play ability that causes all of your buddies in the enchantable grouping to gain 1 power. Will only trigger if you have at least one enchantable buddy for Dr.Lazuli to upgrade.

pages.title: Milk Maid
pages.text: A free activated ability. When you click on Betsy and have at least 1 buddy with a status effect, negative or positive, all of your buddies will be cleared of status effects.

pages.title: Snowball Fight
pages.text: A play ability that causes the opponent to lose 1 life. This does not count as an attack and will not trigger any abilities.
